The characteristic polynomial for 4D:

1/7962624*n^16 - 1/331776*n^15 + 65/1990656*n^14 - 157/497664*n^13 + 
3929/1327104*n^12 - 7/972*n^11 - 490093/1990656*n^10 + 199205/55296*n^9 
- 201626975/7962624*n^8 + 109065299/995328*n^7 - 102824305/331776*n^6 + 
8941951/15552*n^5 - 111915277/165888*n^4 - 1/24*(n^4 - 6*n^3 + 11*n^2 - 
6*n)*t^3 + t^4 + 3148145/6912*n^3 + 1/1152*(n^8 - 12*n^7 + 58*n^6 - 
240*n^5 + 1321*n^4 - 4692*n^3 + 7260*n^2 - 3696*n)*t^2 - 158827/1152*n^2 
- 1/82944*(n^12 - 18*n^11 + 141*n^10 - 918*n^9 + 6015*n^8 - 16182*n^7 - 
121897*n^6 + 1224918*n^5 - 4536900*n^4 + 8475912*n^3 - 7788960*n^2 + 
2757888*n)*t + 163/48*n

The polynomial for determining the number of cells in 4D:

1/7962624*n^16 - 1/331776*n^15 + 65/1990656*n^14 - 157/497664*n^13 + 
1315/442368*n^12 - 923/124416*n^11 - 486709/1990656*n^10 + 
198593/55296*n^9 - 201042623/7962624*n^8 + 108860747/995328*n^7 - 
103295189/331776*n^6 + 73347065/124416*n^5 - 120791941/165888*n^4 + 
3824591/6912*n^3 - 259219/1152*n^2 + 531/16*n + 1
